snippet.title: Goat over it - Official trailer
snippet.description:
Hardcore platformer about the balance a mountain goat which to get the top of the mountain.
Please add on wishlist
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1519660/Goat_over_it/
The name of the game has been changed
Unfortunately, the last splash screen in the video cannot be changed.
